Package o3smeasures.measures

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CouplingBetweenObjects
    Class that implement CBO - Coupling Between Objects measure that gives information how strong a class is coupled with its surrounding software system, by counting the number of other classes to which a specific class is coupled.
    CyclomaticComplexity
    Class that implement the CC - Cyclomatic complexity measure, which is a measure of a module's structural complexity.
    DepthOfInheritanceTree
    Class that implement DIT - Depth of Inheritance Tree measure.
    FanOut
    Class that implement Fan-out measure, which is defined as the number of other classes referenced by a class.
    LackCohesionMethods
    Class that implements the measure LCOM, defined by Chidamber and Kemerer.
    LackCohesionMethodsFour
    LCOM4 measures the number of "connected components" in a class.
    LackCohesionMethodsTwo
    LCOM2 equals the percentage of methods that do not access a specific attribute averaged over all attributes in the class.
    LinesOfCode
    Class that implement LOC - Lines of Code measure.
    LooseClassCohesion
    Class that implement LCC - Loose Class Cohesion measure.
    NumberOfAttributes
    Class that implement the total number of attributes or fields in a class.
    NumberOfChildren
    Class that implement the NOC - Number of children measure.
    NumberOfClasses
    Class that implement the NC - Number Of Classes measure, which indicates the number of classes of a project.
    NumberOfMethods
    Class that implement the total number of methods (including public, protected, and private methods) in a class.
    ResponseForClass
    Class that implement the RFC - Response for class measure, that shows the interaction of the class' methods with other methods.
    TightClassCohesion
    Class that implement TCC - Tight Class Cohesion measure.
    WeightMethodsPerClass
    Class that implement the WMC - Weight methods per class, which is simply the sum of the complexities of its methods.
